title: Job Competency Enhancement Program through Analysis of Online Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Elementary Mathematics Instruction Experience
context.additional_context: A course for current elementary mathematics practitioners to acquire effective strategies for utilizing digital learning tools and enhance job performance through improved self-efficacy and attitudes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the relationship between online learning behaviors and effectiveness using structural equation modeling.
Learners can improve positive attitudes and self-efficacy by 20% or more when utilizing digital resources.
Learners can design online learning strategies applicable to real educational settings through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
